full_summary:
### Charlottetown Laboratory - Diesel Generator Breeching Replacement
#### Tender Information
- **Reference Number**: PW-22-01012218
- **Solicitation Number**: A0123B (2023-00454)
- **Publication Date**: November 2, 2022
- **Tender Closing Date**: December 1, 2022, 14:00:00
- **Procurement Category**: SRVTGD (Repair and Maintenance Services)
- **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
- **Regions of Opportunity**: Canada
- **Regions of Delivery**: Prince Edward Island

##### Request for Proposal
The Canadian Food Inspection Agency is seeking proposals for the removal and installation of a new breeching for the Charlottetown Laboratory's emergency power diesel generator. The contractor must perform and complete the work by March 31, 2023.

##### Mandatory Site Visit
A site visit will be held on November 16, 2022, at 10:00 a.m. (Prince Edward Island time) at the Charlottetown Laboratory (93 Mount Edward Road, Charlottetown, PE C1A 5T1). Interested bidders are required to attend.

##### Tender Requirements
Bidders must submit their proposals electronically to the Canadian Food Inspection Agency's bid receiving office by the tender closing date. The proposals must meet all the requirements outlined in the tender documents.

##### Contact Information
For any inquiries or concerns, please contact Ashley Bennett at Ashley.Bennett@inspection.gc.ca or 343-553-9512.

##### Tender Documents
The tender documents, including the invitation to tender, can be found at the following URL: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/11/02/fee0a25b2a1cb6b6a2e5fcd55f01eed9/a0123b_-_invitation_to_tender.pdf (English) or https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/11/02/9fd0cdac8226f75f82cc99ea4d38f05d/a0123b_-_appel_doffres.pdf (French) Note that the documents are only available in English and French, and bidders are responsible for ensuring that their proposals meet all the requirements outlined in the documents.
